# Summary {.unnumbered}

In summary, there are a lot of things to consider. However, we hope that this playbook will help you to plan ahead and host a rewarding CAFE. Some of our key messasges are:

- know your audience;
- know the parameters that you can work within;
- reach out for help;
- learn from your own and other's experiences.

This is a living document. Please make sure to stay in touch with us via our email addresses (info.rdm@uu.nl, rcafe-lib@tudelft.nl, s.van.de.sandt@vu.nl) and help us to make this playbook more suitable for you.
